entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Remove struct constraint from `Vector*<T>` #85893
  • JIT: Incorrect redundant branch opts example #85892
  • [API Proposal]: Add remaining binary format primitive types to BinaryReader/Writer #85891
  • Polymorphism on System.Text.Json source generation with different assemblies #85884
  • Disabling activity trace propagation for a specific HttpClientHandler with underlying BrowserHttpHandler #85883

PullRequests

Created

  • Update PropertyTabAttribute.Equals() nullability #85896
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Unroll StringBuilder.Append for const string #85894
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Peel offsets from spilled addresses for store decomposition #85889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold "FrozenObjectHandle(REF) + CNS" to a byref constant #85888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix block morphing/physical promotion self-interference #85887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Pin urllib to version 1.26.15 for perf runs #85881
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix JsonNode.To allocations #85886
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix flags checking for `GT_IND` #85890
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed link to PR guide in CONTRIBUTING.md #85876
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • JIT: fix another case of early flow graph divergence #85873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove check from FillStringChecked and rename it to CopyStringContent #85880
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • The AllocationTick threshold is computed by a Poisson process with a 100 KB mean. #85750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Extend PreInitialization Support to readonly GC fields #84431
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move assignment rationalization to before global morph #85872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `gtNewBlkOpNode` and `lvSimdBaseJitType` #85848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Misc LSRA throughput improvements #85842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Constant folding for SIMD comparisons #85584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #85227
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07

PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Export NativeAOT_StaticInitialization implicitly #2262
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Build for wasi sdk #2268

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Console projects should link to a "new to dotnet" page/tutorial #32323
  • .NET SDK first run experience should be OS-specific #32322

Closed

  • Can't run SDK tests in VS #32300

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove template runtimeconfig #32302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07

Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Switch expression as a statement expression #2632
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Syntax actions not always called in Roslyn 4.5.0 #67458
  • Struct record have unexpected initialization behavior #68125

Updated

  • Record struct initialization behavior differs from record classes #68126

PullRequests

Updated

  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Allocate all CSharp.BindingDiagnosticBag instances from a pool. #68108
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #48116
  • Custom InputText has a null ElementReference #48115
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT condition `table_size < 65000' not met #48114
  • Prevent onkeydown event with condition. #48113
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext #48112

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext, single_query #48108
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #48111
  • Better story for multiple instance of dependency injection #48110
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #48107

PullRequests

Updated

  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Fix StackOverflowException in RoutePatternAnalyzer #48105
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2175417 #48106
    area-mvc
  • Add MediaTypeHeaderValue parsing overloads accepting IList of StringSegment #48035
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView2 - Html Audio Control: Can't set currentTime #14964
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException #14963
  • `"Uncaught ReferenceError: Blazor is not defined", source: https://0.0.0.0/ `on physical Android device #14961

Closed

  • Is it possible to use local notifications? #14946
  • How implement to can auto start the application when i configure in settings of Android? #14958

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Updated

  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wishlist: No generate empty lines with public virtual DbSet<Foo> Foos { get; set; } and public virtual DbSet<ViewFoo> ViewFoos { get; set; } and modelBuilder.Entity<Foo>(...) #30839
  • Got a runtime exception by trying to translate Linq query to SQL query #30838
